channel.title: Adding Item's To a Client
channel.description:
Okay, I have recently gotten into Clients [[No less than 2 days ago]]
I can, edit Sprites, and add the background Change text color,Etc,
But i can't Figure out how to add actual items, I don't feel like googling it so don't say that.
